name: Brain Waves: Feed the Hole
description:
Use telekinetic powers to survive wave after wave of enemies by feeding them to an ominous hole in the ground.
Use coins to buy upgrades and place spikes. Buy permanent upgrades in between runs to start off with better abilities and get to the end of all 50 waves!

// WASD to move.
// mouse to aim, charge, and activate your telekinetic abilities.
